com.wikitude.tracker

Interface TrackerManager


  • public interface TrackerManager
    Interface to control the TrackerManager

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TrackerManager.ServerRegion 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientTracker create2dClientTracker(java.lang.String url)
      Creates a new 2D ClientTracker from the passed url
      ClientTracker create2dClientTracker(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String[] extendedTrackingTargets)
      Creates a new 2D ClientTracker from the passed url, activating extended tracking mode for all targets in the extendedTrackingTargets list

      Creates a new 2D CloudTracker from the passed authenticationToken and collectionId

      Creates a new 3D ClientTracker from the passed url

      void setCloudRecognitionServerRegion(TrackerManager.ServerRegion region)
      Set which server CloudTrackers created with the TrackingManger should use.

    • Method Detail

      • setCloudRecognitionServerRegion

        void setCloudRecognitionServerRegion(TrackerManager.ServerRegion region)
        Set which server CloudTrackers created with the TrackingManger should use. Currently Wikitude offers servers in three regions America, China and Europe.
        Parameters:
        region - Defines which server will be used

      • create3dClientTracker

        ClientTracker create3dClientTracker(java.lang.String url)
        Creates a new 3D ClientTracker from the passed url
        Parameters:
        url - Url to the .wtc file, can either be a http url or local asset. In case of a local asset the url must start with file:///android_asset/
        Returns:
        The newly created ClientTracker instance

      • create2dClientTracker

        ClientTracker create2dClientTracker(java.lang.String url)
        Creates a new 2D ClientTracker from the passed url
        Parameters:
        url - Url to the .wtc file, can either be a http url or local asset. In case of a local asset the url must start with file:///android_asset/
        Returns:
        The newly created ClientTracker instance

      • create2dClientTracker

        ClientTracker create2dClientTracker(java.lang.String url,
                                  java.lang.String[] extendedTrackingTargets)
        Creates a new 2D ClientTracker from the passed url, activating extended tracking mode for all targets in the extendedTrackingTargets list
        Parameters:
        url - Url to the .wtc file, can either be a http url or local asset. In case of a local asset the url must start with file:///android_asset/
        extendedTrackingTargets - A list of target names which should be tracked in extended mode, pass {"*"} to track all targets in extended mode
        Returns:
        The newly created ClientTracker instance

      • create2dCloudTracker

        CloudTracker create2dCloudTracker(java.lang.String authenticationToken,
                                java.lang.String collectionId)
        Creates a new 2D CloudTracker from the passed authenticationToken and collectionId
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - Your cloud authentication token
        collectionId - The collection id of the target collection the CloudTracker should load
        Returns:
        The newly created CloudTracker instance

      • create2dCloudTracker

        CloudTracker create2dCloudTracker(java.lang.String authenticationToken,
                                java.lang.String collectionId,
                                java.lang.String[] extendedTrackingTargets)
        Creates a new 2D CloudTracker from the passed authenticationToken and collectionId
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - Your cloud authentication token
        collectionId - The collection id of the target collection the CloudTracker should load
        extendedTrackingTargets - A list of target names which should be tracked in extended mode, pass {"*"} to track all targets in extended mode
        Returns:
        The newly created CloudTracker instance

      • destroyTracker

        void destroyTracker(Tracker tracker)
        Destroys the passed tracker instance
        Parameters:
        tracker - Tracker to be destroyed
